病院長: (びょういんちょう) - director of a hospital
病魔: (びょうま) - demon of ill health; disease

痒い所に手が届く: (かゆいところにてがとどく) - to be extremely thorough, focusing on even the finest of details
痒がる: (かゆがる) - to complain of itching; to be bothered by an itch (or rash, etc.); to feel itchy; to have an itch (or rash, etc.); to itch
痒み止め: (かゆみどめ) - anti-itch medication; antipruritic drug
痒疹: (ようしん) - rash that accompanies a severe itch; prurigo
痕: (ko/ato) - mark , scar (e.g. from operation, injection), trace, mark (e.g. skid marks)
痘痕もえくぼ: (あばたもえくぼ) - love is blind; (when in love) even pockmarks are dimples
痘痕も靨: (あばたもえくぼ) - love is blind; (when in love) even pockmarks are dimples

痛い目にあう: (いたいめにあう) - to go through a bitter experience; to get into trouble; to get hurt; to feel pain
痛い目に合う: (いたいめにあう) - to go through a bitter experience; to get into trouble; to get hurt; to feel pain
痛い目に合わせる: (いたいめにあわせる) - to make (a person) pay for (something)
痛い目に遭う: (いたいめにあう) - to go through a bitter experience; to get into trouble; to get hurt; to feel pain
痛い目に遭わす: (いたいめにあわす) - to make a person sweat for it
痛い目に遭わせる: (いたいめにあわせる) - to make (a person) pay for (something)
痛がる: (いたがる) - to be in pain (referring to others); to complain of pain
痛くもかゆくもない: (いたくもかゆくもない) - of no concern at all; no skin off my nose
痛くもかゆくも無い: (いたくもかゆくもない) - of no concern at all; no skin off my nose
痛くもない腹を探られる: (いたくもないはらをさぐられる) - to be suspected without cause
痛くも痒くもない: (いたくもかゆくもない) - of no concern at all; no skin off my nose
痛くも痒くも無い: (いたくもかゆくもない) - of no concern at all; no skin off my nose

痛みわけ: (いたみわけ) - {sumo} match declared drawn due to injury
痛み入る: (いたみいる) - to be greatly obliged; to be very sorry
痛み分け: (いたみわけ) - {sumo} match declared drawn due to injury
痛む: (いたむ) - (esp. 痛む) to hurt/to feel a pain; (esp. 傷む) to be injured/to be spoiled (e.g. food)

痛める: (やめる) - (病める only) sick/ill/ailing; to hurt/to ache

痛分: (いたみわけ) - {sumo} match declared drawn due to injury
痛快極まりない: (つうかいきわまりない) - extremely thrilling
痛快極まり無い: (つうかいきわまりない) - extremely thrilling
痛快淋漓: (つうかいりんり) - (yoji) very thrilling; extremely delightful; awfully pleasant; intensely satisfying
痛快無比: (つうかいむひ) - (yoji) very thrilling; extremely delightful; awfully pleasant; intensely satisfying
痛感: (つうかん) - feeling keenly; fully realizing

痛撃: (つうげき) - severe attack; hard blow
痛棒: (つうぼう) - severe attack/bitter (harsh) criticism; stick used to strike inattentive Zen meditators
痛痒: (つうよう) - pain and itching; mental anguish/unhealthy emotions
痛痒を感じない: (つうようをかんじない) - to neither itch nor feel pain; to not be affected by something; to not feel the effects of something
痛痛しい: (いたいたしい) - pitiful; pathetic; painful to look at (e.g. painfully thin, painful-looking scars)
痛癢: (つうよう) - pain and itching; mental anguish/unhealthy emotions
痛言: (つうげん) - cutting remark; biting (scathing, bitter) criticism; harsh words
痛車: (いたしゃ) - (joc)  car painted with anime characters/painful car (because some people consider it painful to look at); (イタ車 only)  (original meaning) Italian car/European car
